title: VALORANT
description: Valorant is a team-based first-person tactical hero shooter set in the near future. Players play as one of a set of Agents, characters based on several countries and cultures around the world. In the main game mode, players are assigned to either the attacking or defending team with each team having five players on it.

title: League of Legends
description: League of Legends is a team-based strategy game where two teams of five powerful champions face off to destroy the other's base. Choose from over 140 champions to make epic plays, secure kills, and take down towers as you battle your way to victory.

title: Legends of Runeterra
description: Legends of Runeterra is a free-to-play strategy card game set in the world of League of Legends. It features cards based on the iconic champions of League of Legends, as well as new characters and allies hailing from the regions of Runeterra, each with their own style and strategic advantage.

title: Teamfight Tactics (TFT)
description: Teamfight Tactics is an autobattler: a round-based PvP game where you'll draft a team that battles automatically on your behalf, featuring iconic champions from League of Legends. Your goal? Grow your team and protect your board to become the last player standing.

title: Fortnite
description: Fortnite is a popular online multiplayer game where players fight to be the last one standing in a rapidly shrinking battlefield. It features building mechanics, a variety of weapons, and frequent updates with new content.

title: Bloons TD 6
description: Bloons TD 6 is a tower defense game where players strategically place towers to defend against waves of colorful balloons. It features a variety of towers, upgrades, and maps to challenge players of all skill levels.

title: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout
description: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout is a colorful and chaotic battle royale game where players compete in a series of mini-games to be the last one standing. It features a variety of whimsical obstacle courses and challenges.

title: Rocket League
description: Rocket League is a high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem with easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven competition. Players control rocket-powered cars to hit a ball into the opponent's goal.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is an open-world action role-playing game set in a dark fantasy universe. Players control Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, as he searches for his missing adopted daughter.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Grand Theft Auto V is an action-adventure game set in an open-world environment. Players complete missions—linear scenarios with set objectives—to progress through the story.

title: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)
description: PUBG is a multiplayer battle royale game developed and published by PUBG Corporation, a subsidiary of South Korean video game company Bluehole.

title: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
description: CS:GO is a multiplayer first-person shooter game developed by Valve and Hidden Path Entertainment. It's the fourth game in the Counter-Strike series.

title: Among Us
description: Among Us is an online multiplayer party game where crewmates work together to complete tasks on a spaceship, while impostors try to sabotage and kill them without being caught.

title: Dota 2
description: Dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game developed and published by Valve. It's a sequel to Defense of the Ancients (DotA), a community-created mod for Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an action-adventure game set in an open-world environment. It's the third entry in the Red Dead series and a prequel to the 2010 game Red Dead Redemption.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action-adventure RPG set in the dystopian Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour, and body modification.

title: Rust
description: Rust is a multiplayer-only survival video game developed by Facepunch Studios. Players must successfully manage their hunger, thirst, and health, or risk dying.

title: Monster Hunter: World
description: Monster Hunter: World is an action role-playing game developed and published by Capcom. Players take on the role of a hunter tasked with tracking and hunting down monsters in various environments.

title: Stardew Valley
description: Stardew Valley is a farming simulation role-playing game developed by Eric ConcernedApe Barone. Players can grow crops, raise animals, mine for resources, and build relationships with villagers.

title: Rainbow Six Siege
description: Rainbow Six Siege is an online tactical shooter game developed by Ubisoft. Players control operators from the Rainbow team and counter-terrorism units, each with their own unique abilities.

title: Terraria
description: Terraria is an action-adventure sandbox game developed by Re-Logic. Players can explore, build, and fight in a procedurally generated 2D world.

title: Team Fortress 2
description: Team Fortress 2 is a multiplayer first-person shooter game developed and published by Valve. It's the sequel to the 1996 mod Team Fortress for Quake and its 1999 remake.

title: Apex Legends
description: Apex Legends is a free-to-play battle royale game developed by Respawn Entertainment. It features characters with unique abilities and squad-based gameplay.

title: Fallout 4
description: Fallout 4 is an action role-playing game developed by Bethesda Game Studios. Players assume the role of the Sole Survivor, who emerges from a long cryogenic stasis in Vault 111, an underground nuclear fallout shelter.

title: Skyrim Special Edition
description: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition is an open-world action role-playing game developed by Bethesda Game Studios. It's a remastered version of the original game with improved graphics and mod support.
